chat.title: Epinephrine
chat.message: Epi IM should be first medication on list rather than near the end

chat.title: Med Prioritization
chat.message: Is there a way to communicate prioritzation of medications.  Eg. epi first, benadryl second, etc.

EKG
- highlight urgent interventions for quick recognition
-include concentration of epi
-remove/clean source of contact allergan
-glucometer

-Yellow clinical guideline portion good
-Prioritize Epi - should be checked as default order (include adult dose & peds dose). Also, include option for second and third doses if symptoms do not resolve
-Other meds are discretionary depending on pt symptoms
-Clarify "monitoring" parameters for RN

chat.title: Age
chat.message: Is this for pediatric age group also? or there will be a different order set for the pediatric age group?
